known_issues: Build/deploy pipeline faalt met ‘Configuration error encountered. Please reach out to the Caffeine team.’

existing_features.title: Update the existing CO₂ chart so the 'CO2 Right (%)' series is rendered in a lighter green than the 'CO2 Left (%)' series, and ensure the legend swatch matches those same colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Maak ‘CO2 Right (%)’ een lichtere groentint dan ‘CO2 Left (%)’ (donkergroen) in zowel legenda als grafiek

projectName: Make 'CO2 Right (%)' a lighter green than 'CO2 Left (%)' in the CO2 chart (line + legend)
